Text: Holy Shit! I never thought I would see the day where I get to re-watch ALL of the episodes I have few in my collection! this is just one of those so odd and quirky shows that sticks out from the crowd, sometimes it does feel a bit to centered for a very young crowd but all in all this show is great that coupled with some very strange dream scenes and the black and white photographs for faces ahhh what a great show!
Enough talking about the show but thank you mike3313 another great find on your part! Come on people give this guy some requests he seems to be pretty damned good!
